```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(vistime)
library(plotly)
library(readxl)
```

```{r}
dat = readxl::read_excel("../Data/Summary_stats_all.xlsx", 
                   sheet = "Without nursing stuff", col_names = TRUE) %>%
  janitor::clean_names() %>%
  select(-check, -office_general, -outdoor_type) %>% 
  # outdoor type needs to be manipulated differently
  rename(state = location_name) %>%
  mutate_all(as.character) %>%
  pivot_longer(retail:all_non_ess_business_end_date,
               names_to = "category",
               values_to = "date") 

# excel data change:
# as.Date(variable, origin = "1899-12-30")

knitr::kable(count(dat, date))

head(dat)
tail(dat)
```
